title: Why Tech is so important
text: In previous times, it could take days, possibly weeks, for communication to reach someone just 100 miles away.  In many ways, technology has made the world a smaller place, exponentially decreasing the time required for communication over long distances. This has allowed humanity the potential of coming together like never before in history.

title: Video Conferencing
text: As an aspiring musician, video conferencing has allowed me to connect with teachers and coaches anywhere in the world. I am not limited to those in my town or city.  I love this!

title: The intricacies of JS
text: JS fascinates me due to it's depth of functionaliy, and it is only getting deeper! The possibilities of what it can do is very exciting!

title: Sequelize makes MySQL doable
text: I discovered when learning MySQL that I absolutely hate writing it.  Someone said, and I agree, it is easy to read, hard to write. The syntax is so exacting it caused MUCH frustration when learning it. Enter Sequelize.  This magnificent little package does all the syntax for me! I can write something as an object literal, and my database is updated accordingly.  I love this package!

title: JavaScript Frameworks
text: I put off looking into js frameworks until I learned vanilla js first.  Boy am I glad I did.  The frameworks really streamline things, and deepen my appreciation for Vanilla quite a bit.
